name: Muteki Keiji Daidageki: Shijou Saidai no Hanzai
overview: The hero of the game, Daidageki, is a police agent known for his hot temper and fighting skills. He is working together with his lovely partner, Risa, fighting crime in Bunkyou-ku, a district in the heart of Tokyo. An encounter with a yakuza gang leads to the discovery of plutonium being smuggles into the country. very soon Daidageki and Lisa find themselves fighting for their lives, with no one to protect them but themselves... Most of the gameplay follows the Japanese adventure template: the player chooses command icons, which correspond to actions such as looking, talking, or moving, in order to to advance the story. However, there are also a few turn-based battles in the game. The appearance of enemies is dictated by the story. The player controls Daidageki, using a wide variety of punches and kicks to eliminate the enemies. Daidageki's hit points are restored fully after each fight. There are no RPG elements, experience system, or any rewards for the fights.
